statements: DELETE FROM land_types WHERE land_classification = 'Agricultural' AND land_type_name = 'Farm Land';
DELETE FROM Classifications WHERE classification_name = 'Type A';
DELETE FROM Classifications WHERE classification_value < 100 AND classification_name = 'Low';
DELETE FROM LandTypes WHERE land_type_id = 10 OR land_type_name = 'Forest';
DELETE FROM LandMapping WHERE classification_id = 3 AND spatial_data_id = 5;
DELETE FROM mapping_data WHERE map_id = 10 AND classification_id = 5;
DELETE FROM mapping_data WHERE land_type_id = 5 AND classification_id = 3;
DELETE FROM visualization WHERE visualization_type = 'graph' AND visualization_data ->> 'axis' = 'Y';
